core.name: Manchine Integration
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Manchine Integration: All team members' skill CD of Ultimate Evasion or Perfect Defense shortens by 4.5s.

subskills.name: Manchine Integration
subskills.description: Shortens the CDs of primary effects triggered by Ultimate Evasions and Perfect Defense by 4.5s for the team.

core.name: Switch: Ice Phantom
core.description:
Switch entry triggers Dimension Shift upon entering the battle.
Instant Evasion: Triggers Dimension Shift effects.

subskills.name: Emergency Evasion
subskills.description: Upon entry or evasion, gain 30.0% Move Speed for 8.0s.

subskills.name: QTE: Frost Nova
subskills.description: QTE: Triggers when an enemy is knocked airborne to freeze enemies in a large AOE for 5s, deal 520% ATK of Physical DMG, and inflict 5 Rime Trauma.

subskills.name: Zone Lockdown
subskills.description: When attacked, there is a 40.0% chance to inflict lock the attacker, making it take 30.0% more Physical DMG for 6.0s.

subskills.name: Particle Accelerator
subskills.description: Increases Crit DMG against enemies at least 5 meters away by 25.0%.

core.name: снег
core.description:
Summons artic snow that freezes all enemies.
Land of Frost: Freezes all enemies for 5s and inflicts 18 Rime Trauma.
Frigid Blast: When the freezing ends, deal 150% ATK of Ice DMG against enemies.
SP Cost: 75

subskills.name: Polar Ice
subskills.description: Casting Ultimate boosts Valkyrie Total DMG by 40.0% and charging speed by 60.0% for 12s.

subskills.name: Sniper's Mark
subskills.description: Enemies affected by Land of Frost are locked for 12s and take 35.0% bonus Physical DMG. Team deals 15.0% bonus Physical DMG to locked enemies.

core.name: Dimension Shift
core.description:
Temporarily enters another dimension to evade attacks.
Frost Center: Deals 60% ATK of Ice DMG against the attacker.
Ultimate Evasion: Freezes the attacker for 5s, inflicts 6 Rime Trauma, and slows the Move Speed and ATK Speed of the enemies nearby for 7s.

subskills.name: Frozen Field
subskills.description: Enemies affected by Move Slow effect of Ultimate Evasion suffers 60% reduced Attack Speed.

subskills.name: Deep Snow
subskills.description: Extends the duration of Ultimate Evasion Move effect to 10.0s, and buffs the effect to 80% Move Slow.

subskills.name: Particle Rebuild
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Ultimate Evasion by 3.0s.

core.name: Charge: Particle Cannon
core.description:
Charged cannon fire that deals greater DMG with higher charge sequence.
Arm Switch: Charging mode changes with type of weapon equipped.

subskills.name: Perfect Charge
subskills.description: Releasing the [ATK] button upon entering the next charge sequence increases Crit Rate of this attack by 30.0%.

subskills.name: Reactive Charge
subskills.description: Force evasion when attacked during charging. Can be triggered once every 4.0s. Effect does not interrupt charging.

subskills.name: Ultra Charge
subskills.description: Releasing the [ATK] button upon entering the 3rd charge sequence increases the Crit DMG of this attack by 25%.
